text:
[Verse]
Nights are magic now
Stars above us high
Counting dreams we share
Under moonlit sky

[Verse 2]
Whispers in the wind
Echoes in the night
Every wish we make
Glowing bright like light

[Chorus]
Count one two three
Dreams come alive
Four five six
We feel the vibe
Seven eight nine
Hearts collide
In this dream
We never hide

[Verse 3]
Dancing shadows play
In our secret land
Holding tight our love
Walking hand in hand

[Verse 4]
Time it seems to freeze
Moments pure and rare
Every second feels
Like a silent prayer

[Chorus]
Count one two three
Dreams come alive
Four five six
We feel the vibe
Seven eight nine
Hearts collide
In this dream
We never hide
title: Counting Dreams
